title: Activity-Based Teacher Training Program for Improving English Pronunciation in Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Targeting pre-service/in-service teachers requiring enhanced communication skills using scientific field-specific terminology. Developing capabilities for operating in-house science education programs within enterprises

learning_goals: Identify International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) transcriptions for 50 core science terms with 90% accuracy
Using cross-linguistic awareness strategies, analyze three or more Vietnamese native language interference phenomena and propose pronunciation correction methods
Improve pronunciation clarity scores (CRP 4-point scale) to 3.0 or higher during science presentations through communication-focused activities

resources: Science domain pronunciation error case database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
